Package view

Class ViewLogic

java.lang.Object
view.ViewLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, Remote, EventListener, CommonGoalView, GameView, LivingRoomView, PersonalGoalView, PlayerChatView, PlayerView, ShelfView, UserView, ViewCollection
public class ViewLogic extends Object implements Remote, ViewCollection, ActionListener
This class manages the view of the application and the communication with the server.
